required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of a Third Dose and Immune Persistence of BBIBP-Corv Vaccine in Elderly People With Chronic Bronchitis and COPD
clinical_study.official_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of a Third Dose and Immune Persistence of BBIBP-Corv Vaccine in Elderly People With Chronic Bronchitis and Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: China National Biotec Group Company Limited

collaborator.agency: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention
Beijing Institute of Biological Products Co Ltd.

clinical_study.source: China National Biotec Group Company Limited

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of immunogenicity, safety and persistence of the subjects aged 60 years and above with chronic bronchitis and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease received the third dose of inactivated COVID-19 vaccine .

detailed_description.textblock:
The subjects aged 60 years and above with chronic bronchitis and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease recruited to receive a third dose of inactivated COVID-19 vaccine.
Blood samples will be collected 3 times: before the third dose of vaccinatioin，28 days and 6 months after the third dose of vaccination.
Any local or systemic adverse events that occurred within 21 days after vaccination will be recorded.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Subjects aged ≥60 with chronic bronchitis and COPD who have completed the schedule of two doses for 3 months receive a third dose of inactivated COVID-19 vaccine.

primary_outcome.description: The rate of seroconversion against coronavirus
Neutralizing antibody GMT against coronavirus before the 3th dose
Neutralizing antibody GMT against coronavirus after the 3th dose
Neutralizing antibody GMT against coronavirus after the 3th dose

secondary_outcome.description: Analyse the incidence of adverse events following vaccination, both solicited and unsolicited
Report and analyse serious adverse events

arm_group.description: Subjects receive a third dose of inactivated COVID-19 vaccine

intervention.description: receive a third dose of inactivated COVID-19 vaccine

overall_official.affiliation: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

facility.name: Zhejiang provincial center for disease control and prevention
